## callApi() function

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Call backend API with authentication of Teams.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function callApi(teamsfx: TeamsFxConfiguration, name?: string, param?: any, method?: "get" | "post"): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  teamsfx | TeamsFxConfiguration | Used to provide configuration and auth |
|  name | string | The API name |
|  param | any | Parameters object to be passed to API |
|  method | "get" \| "post" | HTTP method, get or post |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;any&gt;

HTTP response from backend API

## Exceptions

[InvalidConfiguration](./teamsfx.errorcode.md) when API config is invalid.

[InternalError](./teamsfx.errorcode.md) when get user access token failed or access token is invalid.

[FailedOperation](./teamsfx.errorcode.md) when failed to call backend API.
